mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PROFILE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE (MEMBER_EMAIL LIKE '%${query}%' OR MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${query}%') AND MEMBER_DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO != ${memberNo}

SELECT ROOM.ROOM_NO, ROOM.ROOM_NAME,ROOM.ROOM_IMG,CHATTING.SENDER, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(CHATTING.MESSAGE, 4000) AS MESSAGE_SUBSTR, CHATTING.TIME FROM MEMBER MEM JOIN MEMBER_ROOM_NO MRN ON MEM.MEMBER_NO = MRN.MEMBER_NO JOIN ROOM_GROUP ROOM ON MRN.ROOM_NO = ROOM.ROOM_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ROOM_NO, SENDER, MESSAGE, TIME FROM ( SELECT ROOM_NO, SENDER, MESSAGE, TIME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ROOM_NO ORDER BY TIME DESC) AS rn FROM CHATTING_MESSAGE ) CM WHERE CM.rn = 1 ) CHATTING ON ROOM.ROOM_NO = CHATTING.ROOM_NO WHERE MEM.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
